data.title: Fresh baked delicious bagels
data.text: Cascade bagels is such a great place! The owner and staff are always super friendly. They make several kinds of bagels and flavored cream cheese, sandwiches, coffees, pretzels, and my husbands fav bagel dogs. I know several people from out of town that make trips to Lakewood just for their bagels. Some types they have are cinnamon sugar, cheese, everything, blueberry,etc. They are fresh made daily and you will love them!

data.title: Next best thing to NYC Bagels!
data.text:
Every time my husband and I visit our son and grandson in this area of Washington, we make Cascade Bagel & Deli a part of our stops. I usually cannot get past ordering a bagel with FRESH salmon, cream cheese, tomato, onions and capers. Oh my goodness! The bagel is amazing and the salmon is so delicious. Of course, where can one go in the Seattle, WA area and not get a great cup of coffee? Cascade offers hot, dark roasted coffee I love. 

The personnel are well chosen by the owners, as they are friendly, competent which adds to the good experience. If you are a bagel snob because of being spoiled by New York City bagels, you might be pleased to order some from this Northwest deli. I've never seen so many sesame and poppy seeds on any bagel in other places. YUM!! Give Cascade Bagel & Deli a try.

data.title: Home made bagles and more!
data.text: This place is a great off the beaten path located off of Gravelly Lake drive and Bridgeport Way SW. Quick service, many different types of bagels made daily. Great for breakfast and lunch.  Decadent desserts available, you can order in advance.

data.title: Great Bagels!
data.text: Fresh, delicious bagels! It is difficult to find places in the west coast that know how to make lox and cream cheese bagels, and they did a great job. Aside from a specialized "bagel sandwich", they have a variety of bagel options at a reasonable price. Their website is true to form with prices and varieties. It was delicious!

data.title: Good bagels... worst service!
data.text: I went here a few days ago with my friend to grab a bagel for lunch. It was quite good, but not worth the awful cashier that we had to deal with. Some teenage girl behind the counter refused to even look at us until we asked a questioned then she finally turned around and stopped talking to her coworker. BUT, after she answered our questioned she turned right back around. This plus a couple of really rude looks and also the way she yelled out to another customer and then smack talked them under her breath and in front of my friend and I, just made for a really awful experience. I can only hope she's the worst worker they have there, because the bagels were pretty good, and I would go back if the service was better.

data.title: Great bagels...my friend...
data.text: Great bagels...my friend Bob loves the lox here.
